name: BareIRC
description: üåê BareIRC, an IRC Client written in Rust. Its name comes from the fact that it's a very bare bone client with little extra features, but that works flawlessly.

name: Phoenix Player
description: üé∂ Android Music Player built with React Native and Expo.

name: CineCritics
description: Full stack CRUD project leveraging React, PHP + JWT and MySQL. CineCritics is an interactive website made for TV shows lovers where you can search, find and review your favourite TV shows. If you change your mind you can always delete or rewrite your review without any worries.

name: To-Do-Son
description: To-Do app written in Python that transcribes all your tasks in JSON format. It uses the JSON library for cleaner and overall better code; the terminal is customized using the art library. The project is provided with a Jenkins + Groovy pipeline to automate the building, testing, and Docker image-building phases of the project.
